body.name: Sony VPLVW885ES 4K HDR Laser Home Theater Video Projector

features: Screen Size Range: 42-85 inches from 8 feet; 62-126 inches from 12 feet, 83-167 inches from 16 feet
White Brightness: 2000 Lumens; Color Brightness: 2000 Lumens; Calibrated Brightness (cinema 1 mode): N/A

body.description: Revel in stunning 4K HDR laser clarity in any home theater. With 2, 000 lumens, you’ll experience rich cinematic colors, smooth Motion, and dazzling brightness. A highly efficient laser light source gives you years of illumination and infinite dynamic contrast. Its compact size gives greater installation flexibility in any room size. Input Output Terminals: HDMI (2 INPUTS)*1 - Digital RGB/Y Pb/Cb Pr/Cr, IR IN - Minijack, LAN - RJ45, 10Base-T/100BASE-TX, REMOTE - RS-232C, D-sub 9-pin (male), TRIGGER (2 INPUTS) - Minijack, DC 12 V Max. 100 mA, USB - DC 5 V, Max. 500 mA. Operating temperature / humidity - 41 °F to 95 °F (5 °C to 35 °C)/20% to 80% (no condensation).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 4K HDR Laser Home Theater Projector VPL-VW885ES. Revel in stunning 4K HDR laser clarity in any home theater. With 2,000 lumens, you’ll experience rich cinematic colors, smooth motion, and dazzling brightness.

Features Laser light source in new, compact chassis This compact size home projector combines an advanced laser light source with Sony 4K SXRD panel technology. Native 4K resolution for lifelike pictures. With more than four times the resolution of Full HD1, native 4K offers 8.8 million pixels (4096 x 2160) for a picture that’s so incredibly lifelike, it’s like looking at the real thing. 2,000 lumens for spectacular brightness With an impressive 2,000 lumens brightness and a spectacularly high contrast range, 4K images are clear and bright with sparkling highlights and rich, deep blacks.

Features Real-time laser light control for high dynamic contrast With its laser light source the light output power is automatically adjusted depending on the brightness of a scene in content for high dynamic contrast. HDR Compatible Take full advantage of the latest content produced with HDR (High Dynamic Range) for extremely wide contrast range with an even higher range of brightness levels and volume of colors. Advanced SXRD panel for outstanding contrast 4K native SXRD panels produce outstanding native device contrast, reproducing deep blacks by improving the flatness level of the pixel surface.

Features Long lasting 20,000 hour lamp The ultra-pure, highly efficient laser light source provides gives you years of illumination with a 20,000 hour lamp. Reality Creation upscales your favorites. Upscale your existing Blu-ray Disc and DVD movies to near 4K quality. The super-resolution Reality Creation 4K upscaler analyzes every pixel in any direction, then employs a digital signal processing algorithm to map pixels against an ever-evolving picture patterning database, compiled from over 10 years of expertise, to enhance colors, contrast, and textures without enhancing image artifacts. Action stays smooth and sharp with Motionflow Whatever you’re watching, you’ll enjoy a silk-smooth and razor-sharp on-screen look in fast-moving action sequences with Motionflow - even with 4K content. This innovative technology creates and inserts extra frames between the original frames by first comparing key visual factors on successive frames, then calculating the split second of missing action in the sequences. True Cinema 24p mode mimics true movie projection for cinema purists.

VPL-HW45ES VPL-HW65ES VPL-VW295ES VPL-VW695ES VPL-VW885ES VPL-VW995ES Projection Technology SXRD (3 Chip) SXRD (3 Chip) SXRD (3 Chip) SXRD (3 Chip) SXRD Laser Light Source SXRD Laser Light Source Resolution Full HD (1920 X 1080) Full HD (1920 X 1080) Full 4K (4096 x 2160) Full 4K (4096 x 2160) Full 4K (4096 x 2160) Full 4K (4096 x 2160) High Dynamic Range (HDR) No No Yes Yes Yes Yes Brightness 1,800 lumens 1,800 lumens 1,500 lumens 1,800 lumens 2,000 lumens 2,200 lumens Dynamic Contrast No Dynamic Contrast 120,000:1 No Dynamic Contrast 350,000:1 Infinite Dynamic Contrast using real-time laser light level control Infinite Dynamic Contrast using real-time laser light level control Reality Creation Yes (for Full HD) Yes (for Full HD) Yes (for Full 4K) Yes (for Full 4K) Yes (for Full 4K) Yes (for Full 4K) Picture Position (Lens-less 2:35) No No No Yes Yes Yes Anamorphic Capability Standard HD Lens Standard HD Lens Standard 4K Lens Standard 4K Lens Standard 4K Lens ARC-F Recommended Lamp Cycle 6,000 hrs 6,000 hrs 6,000 hrs 6,000 hrs 20,000 hrs 20,000 hrs IMAX Enhanced No No Yes Yes Yes Yes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Greatest Projecting Projector that has ever Projected Projections.
reviews.reviewText: Haven't bought this spectacular item yet. However, the description caught ny attention from across the dual computer screen as I was engaged in my Star Wars: The Clone Wars Tv series streaming from Disney + via a friends account. 11/10 would deffo buy this. Even General Grevious agrees.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars overpriced vs picture quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's definitely worth it
reviews.reviewText: I was going to use the money I earned these past several years from my minimum wage job to send my daughter to college. But then I saw this projector, and I was like, "WOW! You're comin home with me!" So, I used all that money I saved to buy this projector, which I gifted to the family on Christmas. Now my daughter's working at Dave N Busters, but I got a fire projector to watch Grace and Frankie on all night.

reviews.reviewTitle: C’est vraiment le meilleur projecteur HD 4K
reviews.reviewText: C’est vraiment un produit excellent je le recommande à tout le monde d’acheter ce produit.!!!!
